name: Winter Jam Along With Dibs and Friends
name_original: Winter Jam Along With Dibs and Friends
description:
A music toy. Pick a song and play along!

Insturctions:

Press any key to start.

Select song and instruments using the arrows.

Press Being to begin.

Control the drums with Q, W, E, R, Space.

Control Theramin with Mouse. Left click start. Right click stop. Up/Down for vol. Left/Right for pitch. Mouse wheel up for major chord. Mouse wheel down for minor chord. Press middle mouse to play on a single note.
